item.title: About
item.description: Velnix provides technical support in the areas of System administration and Devops. We are a three member team with more than 12 years of industry experience. We all worked for reputed companies like IBM, RedHat etc before starting Velnix. Currently we are providing technical support for leading web hosting companies. We help businesses to troubleshoot and fix serious issues which are causing server downtime and loss of business. We provide installation and configuration support for new applications/devices and modules/plugins that businesses want to implement.

item.title: Imdb Movie Fercher
item.description: Command line tool to search and get details about the movies https://github.com/velnix/imdb-movie-fetcher
